mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tbl_s_district ( DistrictID, DistrictName, CityID, DateCreated, DateUpdated ) VALUES ( #{districtId}, #{districtName}, #{cityId}, #{dateCreated}, #{dateUpdated} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE tbl_s_district
DistrictName = #{districtName},
CityID = #{cityId},
DateCreated = #{dateCreated},
DateUpdated = #{dateUpdated},
WHERE DistrictID = #{districtId}

UPDATE tbl_s_district
DistrictName = #{map.districtName},
CityID = #{map.cityId},
DateCreated = #{map.dateCreated},
DateUpdated = #{map.dateUpdated},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_s_district ( DistrictID, DistrictName, CityID, DateCreated, DateUpdated ) VALUES ( #{map.districtId}, #{map.districtName}, #{map.cityId}, #{map.dateCreated}, #{map.dateUpdated} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tbl_s_district
AND DistrictID like CONCAT('%', #{districtId} , '%')
AND DistrictName like CONCAT('%', #{districtName} , '%')
AND CityID like CONCAT('%', #{cityId} , '%')
AND DateCreated like CONCAT('%', #{dateCreated} , '%')
AND DateUpdated like CONCAT('%', #{dateUpdated} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
